items: Start by selecting an appropriate weight kettlebell for your fitness level.
Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold the kettlebell with one hand at shoulder height.
Press the kettlebell overhead, fully extending your arm and keeping your core engaged.
Begin walking forward, keeping your arm extended and the kettlebell stable overhead.
Take small, controlled steps and maintain a straight posture throughout the exercise.
Continue walking for a set distance or time, then switch the kettlebell to the other hand and repeat the exercise.
Remember to breathe deeply and maintain proper form throughout the exercise.
Once you have completed the desired number of sets, lower the kettlebell back to shoulder height and return it to the starting position.
Strengthens the core and upper body muscles
Can be used as a cardiovascular exercise
Can be modified for different fitness levels and goals
